short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Strips css from pages on request

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: C-strip is a simple tool that strips away css style from webpages with the click of a button, leaving only raw html to view. C-strip can be used as a developer tool or just for pure fun.
